yelp_reviews.author: James P.
yelp_reviews.review: This apartment complex is among the best, well managed small community  you can find today. I have lived in many apartment complex's in my time and this is by far the best. The management team was completely professional throughout the application process, yet still welcoming. We ran into a few snags with section 8 housing, but the team there took it in stride. At one point it was uncertain when and even if we were going to move in. Management continued to hold the apartment for us. The complex is also very strict on the rules and regulations of the lease agreement. This was a breath of fresh air for me because being lax leads to no one fallowing the rules. Lastly, the complex is in an ideal location and most areas, as well as the freeway are easily accessible. Renting here has been a pleasant experience thus far!

They said it would take one week to repair . When I asked the manager what they were doing to fix it they said oh dry the carpets out and your good to go. This happened on the 4th of November 2023. It was still not repaired when I moved out. The water was left off and they put up no safety warnings for the water in the unit to stay out or anything. they didn't ask if i had a place to go or if i needed a place they never followed up to let me know what was going on with the unit but had me pay rent for the entire month . This place is awful the manager wouldn't answer our calls she was screening them. if any others want to come forward about there unit flooding at evergreen ridge i am taking them to small claims court in the process of filing now and have a good strong case for rent deposit as we cleaned without water. also for the cost of the 1000 deposit on new unit and extra expenses for the month i coach surfed. my things were al in my unit ruined and i expect payment for this . No notices given when many people entered my apartment and a 48 hour notice must be issued leaving my things exposed and vulnerable to anyone who walked in my unit. Find another place do not move here they are money hungry unkind and  cheap.

yelp_reviews.author: Melina Z.
yelp_reviews.review:
This apartment complex appears clean and maintained. DO NOT RENT FROM EVERGREEN RIDGE. My husband and I were model tenants--we kept our dog on his lead, cleaned up after him, and always paid rent on time, or within the 5-day window they state in the lease as being acceptable. When we moved out after two years, everything was cleaner than when we found it. We spent hours in there making sure. They not only revoked a free carpet cleaning they granted us after one year (citing that the staff that promised it didn't work there anymore, and that even if we used it, they'd still charge us $150 for a cleaning), but they said it took them four hours to clean it (there was absolutely nothing left to clean). When we applied at our new place, the woman Kelly at the front (so, so rude our whole two years) reported that we let our dog off leash, had smoke damage in the kitchen, and that we were late with the rent three times. Luckily our new property managers are wonderful, and saw it was unsubstantiated. 
They also sued a neighboring resident whose dryer vent was clogged (outside maintenance's responsibility)--it caught fire, they lost everything, and ended up getting slapped with a $10,000 debt to this place. All of this, and yet they never did a thing about the drug dealers that lived everywhere throughout the complex. 
Save yourself a huge headache, don't rent from them, your rent skyrockets (went from $735 to $810/month for a 2-bed in 1-1/2 years), and they will do absolutely everything to withhold every cent of your deposit.

summary.text:
Good

Evergreen Ridge Apartments has won praise from residents for its cleanliness, organizational aspects, and the congeniality of its management staff. Numerous tenants have commended the property manager named John for his attentiveness and commitment to addressing residents' concerns, ensuring that tenants feel welcome throughout their stay. The managing team has replied to user reviews with gratitude, reflecting their proactive approach to tenant satisfaction.

In particular, long-term residents have expressed their contentment, citing experiences of living over five years in an environment they describe as exceptionally pleasant. Compliments have been extended toward the maintenance team, who are noted for their swift response to issues and their polite demeanor. Some testimonials have specifically stated immediate resolutions to maintenance problems, along with the staff's approachable and kind nature, marking high levels of satisfaction with the services provided.

Great

The apartments are not only appreciated for the responsive management but also for the location and the community vibe. Residents enjoy the proximity to local amenities such as shopping centers, post offices, restaurants, and movie theaters, underlining the convenience of living at Evergreen Ridge. Furthermore, the sense of community and safety reported by some tenants adds to the charm of the complex, offering a feeling of belonging and security.

The property has been described as well-maintained, with evidence of continuous care in both the aesthetics and functionality of the living spaces. Individuals have recommended Evergreen Ridge Apartments for their commendable upkeep of the grounds and a management style that creates a welcome atmosphere for tenants and visitors alike. These positive experiences suggest that many tenants find their residency at Evergreen Ridge to be of great value.

Bad

Despite the accolades, Evergreen Ridge Apartments has not been immune to criticism. A few user reviews have mentioned sudden and substantial rent increases that have caught tenants off-guard, challenging the notion of affordability and income restrictions purported by the apartment's management. Additionally, some tenants have reported the presence of mold stemming from earlier water damage, which appears to have been inadequarily addressed or disclosed by the management.

Furthermore, a particular concern raised by tenants involves vehicle towing from the property without proper signage or communication, leading to confusion and added inconvenience for residents. This illustrates a lack of coherency between the property's practices and tenant expectations, suggesting room for improvement in the area of clear and transparent policy enforcement.

Ugly

The most severe grievances go beyond regular management shortcomings, revealing deeply negative experiences that have significantly impacted residents' lives. Personal observations have depicted encounters with management as rude, potentially contributing to an unfriendly environment. Some users have recounted distressing experiences regarding the aftermath of water damage incidents, where the expected support and timely rectification by the property managers fell short, contributing to feelings of neglect and distress among the affected tenants.

In the ugliest scenarios, accusations of dishonest behavior towards tenants during their move-out process have emerged. Alleged unmerited charges, unfounded damage reports, and withholding of security deposits without satisfactory explanation represent severe trust breaches between the property management and tenants. Moreover, failure to maintain essential equipment such as expansion tanks, as suggested by one particular review, raises questions about preventive maintenance practices and legal compliance, highlighting a potential disregard for tenant safety and wellbeing.
